titleStmt.title: A letter to a Lady from William Darrell ... ; wherein he desires a conference with the gentleman who writ her a letter furnishing her with Scripture testimonies against the principal points and doctrine of popery.
titleStmt.author: Darrell, William, 1651-1721.

notesStmt.note: "From the Savoy July the 17." printed at end ; with 1688 in manuscript.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
